BBEX3.M.AED.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in the United Arab Emirates / USD 1 = AED ... (middle)
General: The Dirham is pegged to the US dollar; until 17 February 2002, de jure pegged to the SDR.

Source: Since 2014 International Monetary Fund, Washington  Until 2013 calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the following banks: October 2007 - December 2013 Emirates NBD, Dubai 1980 - September 2007 National Bank of Dubai Ltd., Dubai
